pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: 一緒には映画に行かない、と彼女は彼にきっぱり言った。
lessons.indonesian: She told him once and for all that she would not go to the movie with him.

lessons.japanese: どうかきっぱりと決心してください。
lessons.indonesian: Please make up your mind once and for all.

lessons.japanese: これを最後にきっぱり酒をやめます。
lessons.indonesian: I'll give up drinking once and for all.

lessons.japanese: ギャンブルはきっぱりと止めなさい。
lessons.indonesian: You've got to give up gambling once and for all.

lessons.japanese: きっぱりと彼の頼みを断りなさい。
lessons.indonesian: Turn him down once for all.

lessons.japanese: 「いやだ」ときっぱりした態度でこたえた。
lessons.indonesian: "No," he said in a determined manner.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は彼とは映画に行かない、ときっぱり言った。
lessons.indonesian: She told him once and for all that she would not go to the movies with him.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は彼とは映画に行かない、ときっぱり言った。
lessons.indonesian: She told him in no uncertain terms that she wouldn't go to the cinema with him.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は彼とは映画に行かない、ときっぱり言った。
lessons.indonesian: She told him in no uncertain terms that she would not be going to the cinema with him.

lessons.japanese: 彼女はもう二度と私の顔を見たくないときっぱり言った。
lessons.indonesian: She told me once and for all that she did not want to see me again.

lessons.japanese: 彼女はきっぱり断った。
彼女は、彼を中に入れるのをきっぱりと拒否した。
lessons.indonesian: She flatly refused to let him in.

lessons.japanese: 彼は彼女の容態がどんなに悪いか認識するようきっぱりと言った。
lessons.indonesian: He told her firmly to realize how serious her condition was.

lessons.japanese: 彼は彼らときっぱりと別れた。
lessons.indonesian: He made a clean break with them.
